体捌き: (たいさばき) - defensive body movement (judo, kendo, etc.)
体操場: (たいそうじょう) - gymnasium; drill ground
体操服: (たいそうふく) - gym uniform; track suit
体操着: (たいそうぎ) - gym uniform; track suit
体操競技: (たいそうきょうぎ) - gymnastics competition; artistic gymnastics
体文: (たいもん) - consonant (in the Siddham script)
体格検査: (たいかくけんさ) - physical examination; medical examination; physical checkup
体液性免疫: (たいえきせいめんえき) - humoral immunity
体温: (たいおん) - temperature; body temperature (human, animal)
体温調節: (たいおんちょうせつ) - thermoregulation (of the body)
体積エネルギー密度: (たいせきエネルギーみつど) - energy density (Wh-l)
体積弾性率: (たいせきだんせいりつ) - bulk modulus; volume elasticity; volume modulus; measure of a substance's resistance to uniform compression
体積抵抗: (たいせきていこう) - volume resistivity
体節: (たいせつ) - segment; arthromere; metamere; somite
体節制: (たいせつせい) - segmented body plan; segmentation; metamerism
体節動物: (たいせつどうぶつ) - articulate (i.e. an arthropod or an annelid)
体系化: (たいけいか) - systematization; systematisation; organization; organisation
体系文法: (たいけいぶんぽう) - systemic grammar
体細胞分裂: (たいさいぼうぶんれつ) - somatic cell division (i.e. mitosis)
体細胞超変異: (たいさいぼうちょうへんい) - somatic hypermutation; SHM
体育: (たいいく) - physical education; gymnastics; athletics
体育の日: (たいいくのひ) - Health and Sports Day (national holiday; second Monday in October); Health-Sports Day; Sports Day
体育会系: (たいいくかいけい) - sports-minded; sports-oriented
体育座り: (たいいくすわり) - sitting on the floor grasping one's knees (as in a gym class)
体脂肪: (たいしぼう) - body fat; somatic fat
体脂肪率: (たいしぼうりつ) - body fat percentage
体臭: (taishuu) - odor corporal, odor pessoal, característica (de alguém)
体良く: (ていよく) - decently; gracefully; plausibly; politely; tactfully; discreetly
体良く断る: (ていよくことわる) - to turn someone down (on some pretext) without offending them; to refuse gracefully; to decline politely
体落し: (たいおとし) - body drop (judo); body throw
体落とし: (たいおとし) - body drop (judo); body throw
体術: (たいじゅつ) - classical form of martial art
体裁: (たいさい) - (outward) appearance; (proper) format (e.g. of an essay)/form/style; appearances/decency/show/display; lip-service/insincere words/glib talk
体裁上: (ていさいじょう) - for appearances' sake; for appearance sake
体裁振る: (ていさいぶる) - to put on airs
体裁良く: (ていさいよく) - tastefully; respectfully; decently
体言止: (たいげんどめ) - ending a sentence with a noun or noun phrase
体言止め: (たいげんどめ) - ending a sentence with a noun or noun phrase
体認: (たいにん) - understanding based on experience
体調不良: (たいちょうふりょう) - poor physical health; bad shape
体質: (たいしつ) - constitution (physical)/genetic make-up/predisposition (to disease); structure (e.g. of an organization)/innate characteristics/make-up/nature/culture
体質改善: (たいしつかいぜん) - (yoji) improvement of one's constitution; reformation
体躯: (たいく) - the body; stature; physique; constitution
体軀: (たいく) - the body; stature; physique; constitution
体造り: (からだづくり) - physical culture; bodybuilding (body development, not necessarily weightlifting)
体重が増える: (たいじゅうがふえる) - to gain weight
体重減少: (たいじゅうげんしょう) - weight loss; weight reduction; weight decrease
体重管理: (たいじゅうかんり) - weight control
体重計: (たいじゅうけい) - scale; bathroom scale; weighing machine
体量器: (たいりょうき) - scales for weighing
体長: (たいちょう) - length of an animal (sometimes including and sometimes excluding the tail)
体面: (たいめん) - honour; honor; dignity; prestige; reputation; appearances
体養: (たいよう) - development of the body; caring for one's body
体験: (taiken) - experiência pessoal, experiência física, experiência própria
体験入隊: (たいけんにゅうたい) - boot camp for new recruits (conducted by Japan's Self-Defence Force)
体験学習: (たいけんがくしゅう) - hands-on learning; on-the-job training; experiential learning; learning by doing
体験版: (たいけんばん) - playable version (demo); trial version
体験談: (たいけんだん) - story of one's experience; recounting of one's experiences; narrative; testimonial
何: (o que) - what , what; how many; large number of, many; you-know-what, that
何々: (なになに) - such and such (when being vague, placeholder, etc.)/this and that; What?/What is the matter?/What are the items?
何かいい手はないか: (なにかいいてはないか) - what would be a good way to do it?
何かいい手は無いか: (なにかいいてはないか) - what would be a good way to do it?
何かしら: (なにかしら) - somehow or other; something or other
何かと: (なにかと) - one way or another
何かと言うと: (なにかというと) - on the least pretext; at the drop of a hat
何かと言えば: (なにかといえば) - on the least pretext; at the drop of a hat
何かに付けて: (なにかにつけて) - one way or another
何から何まで: (なにからなにまで) - anything and everything; from top to toe; from A to Z
